title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Conduct research on offshore oil rig operations, safety protocols, and training needs. Gather input from subject matter experts, potential users, and relevant stakeholders. Identify key features, scenarios, and user interactions required for the VR training platform. Develop a comprehensive requirements document and project plan.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including virtual reality environment, simulation engine, user interface, and data management components.

title: Virtual Reality Environment Development
description: Develop the virtual reality environment, including 3D models of offshore oil rigs, equipment, and surrounding environments.

title: Simulation Engine Development
description: Develop the simulation engine to handle various scenarios, physics calculations, and emergency situations.

title: User Interface Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for the training platform, including menus, controls, and feedback mechanisms.

title: Data Management and Reporting
description: Implement a data management system to store and analyze user performance, simulation results, and training progress.

title: Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure data privacy and system integrity.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute testing procedures to ensure the system meets requirements and functions as expected.

title: Deployment and Infrastructure Setup
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure for hosting and deploying the training platform, including virtual reality hardware and cloud resources.

title: Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, user guides, and training materials for the offshore rig workers and instructors.
